summary:
Miles Morales, a 13-year-old Afro-Puerto Rican boy, became the second Spider-Man in Marvel Comics. Created in 2011 by Brian Michael Bendis and Sara Pichelli, he first appeared in *Ultimate Comics: Fallout*. Miles was bitten by a genetically engineered spider, gaining superpowers. After the death of Peter Parker in the Ultimate Marvel Universe, Miles took on the role of Spider-Man.

Some fans were happy to see a new hero, especially a positive role model for kids of color. Others weren't pleased with replacing Peter Parker. Miles has since become popular, appearing in animated series, video games, and the award-winning film *Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse*.
title: Miles Morales
